definition: to add/to attach/to be close to/to be attached
to pay/to hand over to/classifier for pairs or sets of things
attached (or affiliated) secondary (or middle) school/abbr. for 附屬中學|附属中学[fu4 shu3 zhong1 xue2]
to include (as a free gift, when buying sth)/to come with
to adhere to a surface/to absorb/to draw in/(fig.) to attract/(chemistry) adsorption
to adhere/to attach oneself to/to append

sentences.english: Please attach copy of your HKID card or registration slip(s).
sentences.chinese: 请附身份证或注册证副本。

sentences.english: Norwegian Journal of Entomology, with Insekt-Nytt.
sentences.chinese: 挪威昆虫学杂志》附《昆虫新闻》。

sentences.english: He sent it for my review and I had revised it slightly. The resulting file is attached.
sentences.chinese: 他传来给我校阅而我已略作修订，完稿档案附呈。

sentences.english: Conclusion We can break the host's specificity of Eperythrozoon.
sentences.chinese: 结论附红细胞体的宿主特异性可被打破。

sentences.english: Desorption activating energy and pre-exponential factor were calculated.
sentences.chinese: 求出脱附活化能和指前因子。

sentences.english: Low Value shipments including samples should have commercial invoice attached to the shipment.
sentences.chinese: 低值货物包括样品应该开具商业发票，并附在货物上。

sentences.english: I adjoin a copy of my lawyer's letter.
sentences.chinese: 我附了一份律师写的律师函。

sentences.english: I attached the names and phone numbers of those companies here.
sentences.chinese: 我把这些厂名和电话都附在这里。

sentences.english: As requested by a disciple today's poem in calligraphy is attached.
sentences.chinese: 应一弟子的提请，今日的诗作写成翰墨已附呈。

sentences.english: He sent me a letter together with a photograph of his family.
sentences.chinese: 他寄给我一封信里面附了一张他的全家福照片。

sentences.english: In the application shall be stated the reasons therefor, with relevant evidence attached.
sentences.chinese: 申请书应当载明申请理由，并附有关证据。

sentences.english: If you feel the attached picture like "flowers in mist", then you must be a little drunk…
sentences.chinese: 如看到附图像雾又像花，那你一定是有些微醉了。

sentences.english: Please read attached RFP for more details.
sentences.chinese: 请仔细阅读招标书附详情。

sentences.english: Detailed information of the software is attached.
sentences.chinese: 该软件的详细资料附后。

sentences.english: Chinese translations shall be attached to the documents and forms done in foreign languages.
sentences.chinese: 外文书件应当附中文译本。

sentences.english: Please attach one set of relevant catalogues and descriptive literature for our consideration.
sentences.chinese: 请夹附一份有关目錄及详细的說明书以供參阅。

definition: to inject/to pour into/to concentrate/to pay attention/stake (gambling)/classifier for sums of money/variant of 註|注[zhu4]
see also/please refer to/compare (cf.)/to consult for reference
illustration/diagram/graphical representation/to explain with the aid of a diagram
